name: The Dawn Of A Flower
description:
◆ What kind of game is the 'The Dawn Of A Flowe'? ◆
The Dawn Of A Flowe is a love simulation game about an Egyptian princess who has been forced to dress up as a man due to unavoidable circumstances. As the story progresses, there are many options, and you can decide the fate of the protagonist through Choice.

Depending on your choice, she can sometimes fall into futility like a flower that is quickly thrown away, or she can bloom proudly and become a pharaoh. Maybe you can abandon everything and leave to find a new way.

Only You Can Change Her Future.

◆ Plot ◆

A murdered queen. A princess turned away by the pharaoh.
Left alone in the cold reality, she became a prince to survive.

After overcoming a lonely time of struggle, ahead of the coming-of-age ceremony, she is threatened with her life by someone.

Mysterious abilities awakened at a moment of crisis. And three men approaching her.

Who should I trust and who should I be wary of?

Who is the culprit and what is his purpose?

◆ Game Features ◆

* A story that gives a sense of freshness and immersion with Egyptian background fusion fantasy material
* Watercolor style illustration background with cozy yet unique texture
* Two vocal songs and a calm and mysterious piano-centered original BGM
* Various mini-games such as card matching, brick breaking, rhythm games, etc
* The future of the protagonist changes according to choice. Multi-Ending
